title: "Anyone can Photoshop now, thanks to AI’s latest leap"
excerpt: "We recently transformed a portrait of one of us into something unreal, and it took just a few seconds. Opening the image in a new AI version of Adobe Photoshop, we selected the area around the head and typed “add a clown wig” into a box. Up sprouted a curly rainbow of photorealistic locks, blending perfectly into the surrounding trees."
